title: Thrown to the Wolves: Epilogue
description: This is the epilogue to Thrown to the Wolves: The Legend of Hannah & Eli, which takes 700 years later and launches the Shapes of Autumn series. Note: you must subscribe to Veronica Blade's newsletter and will be emailed the epilogue in pdf form. To subscribe and receive epilogue, go to www.VeronicaBlade.com.
author: Veronica Blade
